Evan Luthra is a visionary entrepreneur celebrated for his remarkable ability to transform innovative ideas into successful, high-impact businesses. Recognized as a Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree, Evan’s career trajectory is nothing short of extraordinary. At just 27 years old, his accomplishments span a wide array of industries, from mobile app development to blockchain technology.

Evan’s journey began in his early teens when he first ventured into the digital world by curating technology news, quickly amassing a readership of 250,000. His knack for innovation continued as he entered the mobile app market, capitalizing on its burgeoning popularity. This forward-thinking approach established him as a trailblazer in the startup ecosystem, leading him to start various technology companies and develop products used by millions.

His entrepreneurial spirit was evident from a young age; Evan exited his first company for a seven-figure sum and took the TEDx stage at 17. Since then, he has delivered eight TEDx Talks, sharing his insights on entrepreneurship and innovation.

Evan’s expertise extends to mobile apps through his company, EL Group International, which has developed solutions for Fortune 500 companies. His strategic approach—conceptualize, innovate, execute—has been the cornerstone of his success. Through his Startup Studio Incubator Fund (StartupStudio.online), he supports non-tech entrepreneurs with capital, technology, and marketing resources, having built and invested in over 300 companies with a combined market cap exceeding $100 billion.

A recognized authority in blockchain technology, Evan’s contributions have earned him accolades as a Top Blockchain Expert of 2022 by USAToday. His work in this space includes investing in and supporting leading blockchain ventures, and he has received an honorary Ph.D. in Blockchain for his impact on the industry.

Evan’s investment portfolio is diverse, including early stakes in Snapchat, Eaze.com, Wheelys Cafe, and Hashgraph.com, among others. He believes in using technology to disrupt traditional industries and is involved in a wide range of sectors, including FoodTech, FinTech, AI, and more.

As a sought-after speaker, Evan has shared his knowledge at prestigious institutions and events such as TEDx, the United Nations, and Google. His expertise in NFTs has also been recognized, with Business Insider naming him a top NFT expert to follow on Twitter.

Evan’s influence extends through his contributions to Forbes, Entrepreneur, and CoinTelegraph, where he writes about the rapid pace of technological change. Featured in numerous documentaries and media outlets, including Al Jazeera and ABC News, he has garnered a substantial following of over half a million across social networks.
